contentrichtext.text: '''RMI''' may refer to: In '''computing''': * [[Railcar Management LLC]], a rail information services software company and subsidiary of GE Transportation * [[RMI Corporation]], a semiconductor company manufacturing CPUs * [[Java remote method invocation|Remote Method Invocation]], an application-programming interface used in Java environments * [[MIDI#File formats|RIFF MIDI file]], used in Microsoft Windows '''Other''': * [[Federico Fellini International Airport]], serving Rimini in Italy (IATA code) * [[Radio-magnetic indicator]], an instrument used in aircraft navigation * [[Radio Massacre International]], a British electronic-music group * [[Ramapo Mountain Indians]], a Native American group * [[Rank mobility index]], a measure of change in population-rank * [[Repetitive motion injury]], usually RSI * [[Republic of the Marshall Islands]], a nation-state in Micronesia * [[Revenu minimum d'insertion]], a form of welfare introduced in France in 1988 * [[Rocky Mountain Institute]], a non-profit energy-conservation organization in the United States of America * [[Rocky Mount Instruments]], manufacturer of the RMI 368 Electra-Piano and Harpsichord * [[Royal Manchester Institution]] (1823-1882), a learned society promoting the arts in Manchester, England {{disambiguation}}
